snippet: The gun bills that the Senate is about to consider offer a new example of the skill with which its leader, Harry Reid of Nevada, evolves on issues.
abstract: Sen Harry Reid's evolution from gun rights proponent to shepherd of legislation that would expand background checks, among other gun control measures, is indicative of his politics and leadership style; Reid is preparing to bring the most expansive package of gun safety legislation in a decade to the Senate floor.
lead_paragraph: The gun bills that the Senate is about to consider offer a new example of the skill with which its leader, Harry Reid of Nevada, evolves on issues.

headline.seo: Harry Reid Draws on Political Calculus as He Leads Senate
headline.main: As Views Shift on Guns, Reid Corrals Senate
headline.print_headline: As Views Shift On Guns, Reid Corrals Senate
